Class MissionCommandWords

  • java.lang.Object
    • MissionCommandWords
  • public class MissionCommandWords
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates an object which stores, in a flexible manner, and allows acces to all the commands in the game that are only used to progress tasks, but not as actual functional interactive features.
    Version:
    1/12/2020
    Author:
    Alexandru Matei

      Checks if a given word is part of its list of task-related commands.
      void showAllMissionSpecificCommands()
      Prints out all the command words created for the missions.

      • isMissionCommand

        public boolean isMissionCommand​(java.lang.String aString)
        Checks if a given word is part of its list of task-related commands.
        Parameters:
        aString - A string you wish to check.
        Returns:
        true - if the given String is a task-specific command word, false otherwise.
